resources.title: Hetzner Cloud: Unleash Your Projects with Free Credits
resources.description: Power up your cloud hosting with €20 free credits! Enjoy reliable, scalable servers to bring your ideas to life without breaking the bank.

resources.title: Windsurf IDE: Code Smarter with 500 Free Credits
resources.description: Supercharge your development workflow with Windsurf IDE. Get 500 free credits to explore cutting-edge tools and streamline your coding projects.

resources.title: EmailOctopus: Reach More with 10,000 Free Emails
resources.description: Grow your audience effortlessly with EmailOctopus. Send up to 10,000 emails per month for free and connect with your subscribers like never before.

resources.title: BrightData MCP: AI-Powered Web Scraping with Free Credits
resources.description: Connect your AI assistant to the web! Get 5,000 free requests monthly for AI-powered web scraping. Extract data from Amazon, LinkedIn, Instagram, and 40+ platforms without getting blocked.

resources.title: GLM-4.6: Enhanced AI Model with 200K Context Window
resources.description: The latest evolution in the GLM series with 357B parameters and MoE architecture. Excels in complex reasoning, coding, and agentic applications with superior performance in real-world development environments.

resources.title: Droid CLI: 20 Million Free Tokens First Month
resources.description: Powerful command-line AI tool with access to Claude Sonnet 4.5, GPT-5, and Claude Opus. Perfect for developers who want extensive free access to premium AI models right in their terminal.

resources.title: Zed: High-Performance Collaborative Code Editor
resources.description: Lightning-fast, AI-powered code editor built in Rust. Features real-time collaboration, integrated AI assistance, and blazing performance. Free and open-source for developers who demand speed.

resources.title: Astro: The Web Framework for Content-Driven Websites
resources.description: Build fast, modern websites with less JavaScript. Astro's islands architecture delivers exceptional performance for blogs, documentation, and marketing sites. Free and open-source.

resources.title: Exa.ai: AI-Powered Search API for Developers
resources.description: Next-generation search API powered by AI embeddings. Get $10 in free credits to access semantic search, web scraping, and content discovery capabilities. Perfect for building AI applications that need real-time web data.

resources.title: Jina AI: Search Foundation for AI Applications
resources.description: Powerful multimodal AI search and embedding API. Get 10 million free tokens monthly to build advanced search, recommendation, and RAG applications. Supports text, images, and more.

resources.title: Context7: MCP Server for AI Assistants
resources.description: Enhance your AI assistants with MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers. Context7 provides powerful context management and integration capabilities for Claude, Cursor, and other AI tools.

resources.title: Ref.tools: MCP Toolkit with Free Credits
resources.description: Complete MCP (Model Context Protocol) toolkit for building AI-powered applications. Get 200 free credits to access reference management, data integration, and context enhancement tools.

resources.title: Convex: The Reactive Backend for Modern Apps
resources.description: Build full-stack applications with real-time data sync and serverless functions. Convex offers a generous free tier with automatic scaling, TypeScript support, and seamless integration with React and Next.js.

resources.title: TanStack Start: Full-Stack React Framework
resources.description: Build modern full-stack React applications with TanStack Start. Features server-side rendering, routing, data loading, and seamless integration with TanStack Query. Free and open-source.

resources.title: Cloudflare: Global Edge Network & CDN
resources.description: Deploy your applications on Cloudflare's global network with Pages, Workers, and R2 storage. Generous free tier includes unlimited bandwidth, DDoS protection, and edge computing capabilities.

resources.title: Vercel: Frontend Cloud Platform
resources.description: Deploy your Next.js, React, Vue, and static sites instantly with Vercel. Free tier includes unlimited deployments, automatic HTTPS, serverless functions, and edge network distribution.

resources.title: Bunny.net: Ultra-Fast Global CDN & Storage
resources.description: Supercharge your website with lightning-fast content delivery across 127+ locations worldwide. Pay-as-you-go pricing starts at just $1/month with DDoS protection, edge storage, and video streaming included.

resources.title: Brevo: All-in-One Email Marketing Platform
resources.description: Grow your business with powerful email marketing tools. Send up to 9,000 free emails per month (300/day) with automation, AI-powered content, drag-and-drop editor, and 24/7 support. Perfect for small businesses and solopreneurs.

resources.title: Zoho ZeptoMail: Reliable Transactional Emails
resources.description: Send important transactional emails with 99% deliverability. Get 10,000 free emails to start, then pay-as-you-go with no monthly fees. Perfect for order confirmations, password resets, and notifications.

resources.title: OpenRouter: Access 300+ AI Models with One API
resources.description: Unified gateway to GPT-4, Claude, Gemini, Llama, and 300+ AI models. Free tier available with access to multiple free models. OpenAI SDK compatible, pay-as-you-go pricing, and intelligent model routing for optimal performance.
